name: Anoras Quest
description:
A tragedy occured at Dalanor's Kingdom: the evil monster Draacau emerged from the darkness to destroy the realm and steal the Guardians powers: The Fauna and Flora Guardians.

In every darkness there is always some hope, and this story it's not an exception! The old statue of the kingdom will come to life to commit it's mission.

Will she save Dalanor from Draacau and his minions?
